effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 830,664 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 315,173.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 347 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
